title: To Catch A Cheater: She's Worried Her Boyfriend Is Distancing Himself For The Wrong Reasons
description:
You think your significant other is cheating, but you’re not certain. We’ll put them to the test! We’re ready to set the trap and go on Instagram (well, we’d send Kristin’s friend on Instagram) to try to lure him into doing something inappropriate so we could expose him as the dirty cheater he is (or, to be fair, expose him as the great guy and boyfriend that he is).
She hasn't been able to see her boyfriend because she's been working out of the state for the last month. During the first few weeks, her boyfriend made an effort to constantly reach out to her. But lately, he's been more unavailable than usual. Does this mean he's up to something sketchy?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
